description: Simple and native GTK4 tool. Looks to be exactly what's needed for many cases compared with too crowded Postman or RestFox.

Liking this so far, much less cruft than postman. One thing that's annoying is the UI is hidden if a request takes a long time or times out, it would be nice to be able to cancel a request rather than restart the app.
summary: Pretty basic but does the job

description: It will be better if it allows to save the request that you have done before
